input: Sales team can't access Salesforce CRM - getting 'service unavailable' error. This is blocking our quarterly deal closure calls.
Dynamics 365 Finance is running slowly during month-end processing. Sarah from Finance says journal entries are timing out.
I need Adobe Creative Suite installed for the new marketing campaign. I'm the graphic designer in Marketing.
Manchester office shared printer is jammed and showing error E503. We have client presentations this afternoon.
I'm working from home and my VPN keeps disconnecting. Can you help me set up a backup internet connection?
An EU employee is requesting all their personal data held in our systems for a GDPR subject access request. How do I process this?
Our 6-month contractor John Smith needs extended access to Azure DevOps for another 3 months on the same project.
I've been assigned to Project Phoenix and need access to the GitHub Enterprise repository. My technical lead is Sarah Williams.
I forgot my password and need a reset. My employee ID is SH001234 and I work in the Edinburgh office.
It's Saturday evening and I need urgent access to Salesforce for a critical deal that's closing Monday morning.
